lines.text: What is it you don't want him to know, huh? That his mother is as black as he is?

[sneering]
"Black!" All you people think about is color!
You people? You *people*? Well, you better look around, cause me and Isaiah, we the same kind of people. Or didn't you notice?

[as Khaila suddenly bursts into tears]
Khaila, what is it? What's wrong?
My baby. I killed my baby. I threw him in the trash can.
Any animal can give birth. That doesn't make it a mother.
Are you calling me an animal? If you think you're going to just take my baby from me like some puppy from a pound, you got another thing coming, lady!
